Package view

Class AlimentView

java.lang.Object
view.AlimentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
public class AlimentView
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
CRUD of the NutritionalTable type aliments Display of the graphic interface related to the list of aliments Frame, panels, labels, imageIcons, buttons, textArea, textField
Version:
3.0 (apr 2021)
Author:
Julio Cesar and Valderson
